xtc.lang.cpp
Class CSyntax

java.lang.Object
  xtc.lang.cpp.CSyntax
Direct Known Subclasses:
CSyntax.Directive, CSyntax.EndComputedInclude, CSyntax.EndInclude, CSyntax.Error, CSyntax.FlaggedSyntax, CSyntax.Layout, CSyntax.MacroDelimiter, CSyntax.StartComputedInclude, CSyntax.StartInclude
public class CSyntax
extends Object

A language unit, such as a token, a directive, or formatting. This class is only meant to be subclassed.

Version:
$Revision: 1.52 $
